notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're trying to access might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.

errorPage.title: Something Went Wrong
errorPage.description: We're sorry, but something went wrong. Please try refreshing the page or contact support if the problem persists.

emptyList.title: No {itemType} yet
emptyList.description: Your {itemType} will appear here in the future!
